summary.span: 代表 物件的已排序集合。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了如所述，這個類別的成員的行為完全如所述， ，和文件。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable 功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別會提供數個特殊功能：物件可以宣告為唯讀以改善所做的多個物件之間共用效能、 複製，並變更為安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需詳細資訊，所提供的不同功能的相關物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreGeneralTransformObjectElements**oneOrMoreGeneralTransformObjectElements* 一或多個宣告使用物件元素語法的物件。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
